verses.verse: In <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptizer <S%G910><s%> came, <S%G3854><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> saying,
"Repent, <S%G3004><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of Heaven <S%G3772><s%> is at hand! <S%G1448><s%>"

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> by Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> make <S%G2090><s%> ready the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> paths <S%G5147><s%> straight. <S%G2117><s%>"

Now <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> wore clothing <S%G1742><s%> made of <S%G575><s%> camel <S%G2574><s%>'s hair, <S%G2359><s%> with <S%G2532><s%> a leather <S%G1193><s%> belt <S%G2223><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> his <S%G846><s%> waist. <S%G3751><s%> His <S%G846><s%> food <S%G5160><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wild <S%G66><s%> honey. <S%G3192><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> people from Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the region around <S%G4066><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%> went out <S%G1607><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>
They <S%G2532><s%> were baptized <S%G907><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> confessing <S%G1843><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins. <S%G266><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when he saw <S%G1492><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sadducees <S%G4523><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> baptism, <S%G908><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "You offspring <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> warned <S%G5263><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> to flee <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come? <S%G3195><s%>
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> bring forth <S%G4160><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of repentance! <S%G3341><s%>

Don't <S%G3361><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> <S%G2192><s%> 'We have Abraham <S%G11><s%> for <S%G3962><s%> our father, <S%G3962><s%>' for <S%G1063><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to raise up <S%G1453><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> to Abraham <S%G11><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> stones. <S%G3037><s%>

"Even <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> the <S%G2532><s%> axe <S%G513><s%> lies <S%G2749><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> of the trees. <S%G1186><s%> Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> that doesn't <S%G3361><s%> bring <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is cut down, <S%G1581><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire. <S%G4442><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> repentance, <S%G3341><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> he who <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> mightier than <S%G2478><s%> I, <S%G3450><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> worthy <S%G2425><s%> to carry. <S%G941><s%> He <S%G846><s%> will baptize <S%G907><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

His <S%G846><s%> winnowing <S%G4425><s%> fork is in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he will thoroughly cleanse <S%G1245><s%> his <S%G846><s%> threshing floor. <S%G257><s%> He will gather <S%G4863><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wheat <S%G4621><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the barn, <S%G596><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the chaff <S%G892><s%> he will burn up <S%G2618><s%> with unquenchable <S%G762><s%> fire. <S%G4442><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G3854><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the Jordan <S%G2446><s%> to John, <S%G2491><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> would have <S%G2192><s%> hindered <S%G1254><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I <S%G1473><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> you, <S%G4771><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me? <S%G3165><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> answering, <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> "Allow <S%G863><s%> it <S%G2076><s%> now, <S%G737><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> is the fitting way for <S%G4241><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> to fulfill <S%G4137><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>" Then <S%G5119><s%> he allowed <S%G863><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> when he was baptized, <S%G907><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> directly <S%G2117><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the water: <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> were opened <S%G455><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> as <S%G5616><s%> a dove, <S%G4058><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the heavens <S%G3772><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I am well pleased. <S%G2106><s%>"
